Stops attacking and generates a total of 20 DP over the skill duration. Throws the banner to the location of the allied unit with the lowest HP percentage within range, granting them DEF +10% and restoring their HP equal to 10% of Saileach's ATK every second. When the skill ends, retrieve the banner

Stops attacking and immediately gains 10 DP. Throws the banner to the location of ground enemies, dealing 170% Physical damage and Stunning them for 2.5 seconds.
